Anderson bụ onye America na-ahụ maka ego na onye na-eme ngagharị iwe n'ọzara
Onye a ma ama na Potomac Appalachian Trail Club (PATC) na mpaghara Washington D.C
site na mmalite ya, ọ bụkwa onye guzobere The Wilderness Society.
N'ihi njikọ ya na PATC, Anderson maara Benton MacKaye nke ọma, onye na-elekọta ọhịa bụ onye mbụ tụụrụ aro Appalachian Trail

Anderson nwere nchegbu karịsịa maka atụmatụ iwu ihe ndị dị na mbara igwe n'akụkụ Appalachian crest, ihe ya na MacKaye kerịtara, onye na-eso onye isi oche PATC Myron Avery n'oge ahụ na-agba isi na isiokwu ahụ.  N’August 1934, Anderson degara MacKaye akwụkwọ banyere ọchịchọ ya ịmalite ọha mmadụ mbụ nke mba ahụ raara onwe ya nye maka nchebe nke ọzara: “Gị na Bob Marshall anọwo na-ekwusa na ndị hụrụ oge ochie n’anya kwesịrị ịnakọta ọnụ ma kwuo echiche ha n’ịdị n’otu
Nke ahụ bụ ihe m ga-achọ ịmalite".
